Name: Staffordshire Delight
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A modern day pick-me-up / hair-of-the-dog with a rich, enlivening bittersweet bite.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Thomas Dalloway, United Kingdom.
Nutrition: One serving of Staffordshire Delight contains 236 calories
